name: Mustafa
headerTaglineTwo: I'm Mustafa Budak alias Mystik - aspiring
about: I am an aspiring developer with an interest in web development. Currently, I am pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science at a University in Cologne, where I am gaining a solid foundation in programming and web development. I am eager to learn and create innovative web applications and contribute to the Computer Science community.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹ I'm an aspiring software engineer, currently studying Computer Science.
resume.description: My passion for computer science stems from my early experiences with computers. Growing up, I was captivated by troubleshooting and optimizing operating systems and software to enhance the performance of older-generation machines. In my teenage years, this interest evolved into a deeper understanding of programming, shifting my focus from hardware to software. Following my apprenticeship, I realized that coding and programming were my true passions, solidifying my desire to pursue a career in this field.

aboutPara: I am an aspiring developer with an interest in web development. Currently, I am pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science at a University in Cologne, where I am gaining a solid foundation in programming and web development. I am eager to learn and create innovative web applications and contribute to the Computer Science community.
